title: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please provide steps to reproduce the issue.]
OB: Exporting multiple files with the same name but different directories to a zip file should successfully store all the files in the resulting zip file.
EB: When multiple files with the same name but different directories are exported to a zip file, only one instance of the file is stored in the resulting zip file. Subsequent instances with the same name are overwritten.
SR: The export functionality should be modified to preserve all instances of files with the same name under different directories when creating a zip file.
